original_title: Two cops including SI arrested over drug trafficking links
original_body_lines: Two police officers including a Sub-Inspector (SI) and a Sergeant have been arrested by the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) for allegedly maintaining dealings with drug traffickers.

Accordingly, a Sub-Inspector attached to Mawathagama Police Station and a Sergeant of the Doretiyawa Police Station have been arrested by the CID and are being questioned under detention, police said.
